message: Let's get this done quickly. 10% of the value disappears for you if we go to another round, Bob!
This is a fair deal, Alice. Let's split the money evenly before it loses any more value.
Another round gone, Bob, and another 10% gone from your potential earnings.  I'm feeling generous today, though!
Alice, we're losing value with each round. Let's be reasonable and split the money closer to 50/50. This offer is the best I can do, considering the inflation.
Time is money, Bob, and quite literally so in this case!  I'm offering you a bit more, but this is your last chance to walk away with a decent share.
